basic.floral_language:
Kalanchoe serrata
Floriography: miniature, beautiful, tenacious
Small leaf Bryophyllum pinnatum has upright stems, smaller green leaves than large leaf Bryophyllum. Leaf surfaces have dark green dots. With adequate sunlight, the edges and stems turn slightly pink. Strong reproductive ability by sprouting lateral buds at the edge of the leaves which develop roots after detached.
Likes sunny places, no dormancy. Flowers sometimes with bell-shaped flowers in orange-yellow.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, orange red flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, when sunny leaf edges turning to pale pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate sunlight no apparent period of dormancy
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, keep soil moist, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once every 1-2 months
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
